Vaaran English.translation: One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor
Name of the true Guru is the truth, knowable only becoming gurmukh, the Guru orientated.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: siqgurU dw s`cw nwm hY, gurmuK (lok ies nUM) jwxdy hn[

Vaaran English.translation: The holy congregation is the only place where sabad-brahm,

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (gurW dI) swD sMgq hI s`cw Qwauˆ hY (ikauˆ jo 'sbd vKwxIAY' auQy) bRhm dI crcw huMdI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: drgh scu inAwau; jl duDu CwxIAY [
lines.transliteration_english: dharageh sach niaau; jal dhudh chhaaNeeaai |

Vaaran English.translation: The true justice is done and water is sifted from milk.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (gurW dI) sBw ivKy s`cw inAwauˆ huMdw hY, pwxI qy du`D A`fo A`f huMdw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: Surrender before the Guru is the safest shelter, where through service (the merit) is earned.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gurU dI Srx hI Awsrw rUp hY, (cOrwsI dI PwsI k`tdI hY, prMqU) syvw kr ky jgÎwsU Pl lYˆdy hn)[

lines.transliteration_english: sabadh surat suN gaau; andhar aaNeeaai |

Vaaran English.translation: Here, with full attention the Word is listened to, sung and embedded in the heart.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gurU sbd nUM suxdy qy gWvdy (BeI vkqw hovy qW SRoqw, jy SRoqw imly qW vkqw bx jWdy) hn, Awp mn ivKy in`DÎwsn krdy hn,

Vaaran English.translation: I am sacrifice unto such a Guru who bestows honour to the humble and the lowly.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: Aijhy (siqgurU) dy kurbwn jWdw hW, jo (myry ijhy) inmwxy nUM mwx idMdy hn[ AglI pauVI ivKy aunHW dI sMgq dw vrnx krdy hn:-

lines.gurmukhi: cwir vrn gur isK; sMgiq Awvxw [
lines.transliteration_english: chaar varan gur sikh; sangat aavaNaa |

Vaaran English.translation: In the congregation of the Sikhs of the Guru, the people of all the varnas assemble.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gurU jI dy is`KW dI sMgq ivKy (K`qRI, bRwhmx, sUd, vYS) cwry vrxW (dy lok) Awauˆdy hn[

lines.transliteration_english: guramukh maarag vikh; ant na paavaNaa |

Vaaran English.translation: The way of the gurmukhs is difficult and its mystery cannot be understood.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (prMqU) gurmuKW dw mwrg ivKm (krVw) hY, ies dw AMq nhIˆ Aw skdw (ikauˆ jo qiq`KÎw shwrnI pYˆdI hY, AQvw gurmuKW dy mwrg dI iek aulWG dw AMq nhIˆ hY)[

lines.gurmukhi: quil n AMimRq ieK; kIrqnu gwvxw [
lines.transliteration_english: tul na anmrit eikh; keeratan gaavaNaa |

Vaaran English.translation: Even the sweet juice of sugarcane cannot be compared with the delight of kirtan, the melodious recitation of hymns.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (auQy Aijhw) kIrqn ho irhw hY, (ijs dy) brwbr keI kmwdW (dy rs) AMimRq brobrI nhIˆ krdy[

Vaaran English.translation: Here, the seeker gets all the four ideals of life i.e., dharma, arth, kam and moks.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: cwry pdwrQW dI iBiKAw pwauˆdy hn[

Vaaran English.translation: Those who have cultivated the Word, have merged in the Lord and have liberated themselves from all the accounts.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (ijnHW ny) AlK (vwihgurU dw) Sbd kmwieAw hY (Eh lok Awp vI) lyKy Qoˆ AlyK ho gey hn[

lines.gurmukhi: suJin BUq BivK; n Awpu jxwvxw ]2]
lines.transliteration_english: sujhan bhoot bhavikh; na aap jaNaavaNaa ||2||

Vaaran English.translation: They see through all the ages and yet do not put themselves above others.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (ijhwku aunHW nUM) BUq Biv`Kq (vrqmwn iqMno kwlW) dw igAwn ho jWdw hY, (prMqU iqRkwl gXwqw hoky bI) Awpxw Awp nhIˆ gxwauˆdy (Bwv AhMkwr nhIˆ krdy)[

Vaaran English.translation: I bow before the eternal Lord who by his own grace shows his invisible form (in all the creatures).

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: Akwl purK (Xw gurU nwnk) nUM (myrI) nmSkwr hY jo AlK (vsqU) dy lKxhwry hn[

Vaaran English.translation: He gracefully makes the unstruck melody enter into the unchiselled mind and refines it.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (Anhd) iek rs Sbd dw (Avyis=sQwn) hn, AGV (jo mn hY aus) dy GVnhwry hn[

Vaaran English.translation: He, in the company of the saints, makes one drink the nectar, which otherwise is not easy to digest.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: swD sMgq ivKy jo (jigAwsU) prvyS krdw hY (aus nUM nwm) AMimRq iplwauˆdy hn[

Vaaran English.translation: Those who have received the teachings of the perfect, remain steadfast on truth.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gurU pury (dw ijnHW nUM) aupdyS hoXw hY (aunHW ny) s`c nUM idRV kIqw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK BUpiq vyis; n ivAwpY mwieAw [
lines.transliteration_english: guramukh bhoopat ves; na viaapai maaeiaa |

Vaaran English.translation: In fact, the gurmukhs are the kings but they remain away from maya.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gurmuK lok rwjy dw srUp hn prMqU mwXw qoˆ Alyp rihMdy hn[

lines.transliteration_english: brahame bisan mahes; na dharasan paaeiaa ||3||

Vaaran English.translation: Brahma, Visnu and Mahesa cannot have the sight of the Lord (but the gurmukhs have the same)

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: bRhmw ivSnUM, iSv (iqMny dyvqy bI) drSn nhIˆ pw skdy[

Vaaran English.translation: Visnu incarnated ten times and established his names.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: ivSnUM ny ds Avqwr (Dwrky) nwm hI gxwieAw (Bwv, ivSnUM dw ArQ hY, 'jo swry vÎwpk hovy', Pyr rwKS dw nwS kr ky Awpxy Awp dw ikauˆ Gwq kIqw, AQvw Awpxw hI nwm jpwky pwlnwid sqogux ivKy irhw)[

Vaaran English.translation: Destroying the demons he increased the conflicts.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: h`QW nwl (kMswidk) rwKSW dw sMGwr kIqw, Aqy JgVw vDwieAw[

Vaaran English.translation: Brahma thoughtfully recited the four Vedas;

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: bRhmW ny vydW dw ivcwr (lokW nUM) AwKky suxwieAw[

Vaaran English.translation: But created the universe out of his ego.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: pr mn ivKy (ies) hMkwr (ivc visAw irhw hY ik mYˆ) jgq pYdw kIqw hY, (so rjogux ivKy visAw irhw)[

Vaaran English.translation: Siva being engrossed in tamas always remained vexed and angry.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: iSv qwr lw ky qmo gux ivKy q`qw hI irhw, (SWiq nw AweI)[

Vaaran English.translation: Only gurmukhs, the Guru orientated, forswearing their ego reach the door of liberation.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gurmuK mukqI dw drvwzw hn, (ijnHW ny) Awpxw Awp gvw idqw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: Even being an ascetic, Narad merely talked (of here and there).

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: nwrd ny (Awp nUM) 'munI' (eISÍr dw mnnSIl) khw ky gl hI suxweI (Bwv g`p hI mwrI, s`c nhIˆ kIqw) (AQvw lokW dIAW g`lW suxn leI hI AwieAw ikauˆ jo iek dUjy dIAW g`lW suxky)[

Vaaran English.translation: Being a backbiter, he popularised himself only as a tell-tale.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: cuglI v`tx nwl byieqbwrw hI sdwieAw (Bwv rwKSW dIAW g`lW dyviqAW pws q aunW dIAw g`lW rwKSW pws AwKky Gol mcwey, nwrd dy pRymI aus nUM AYsw hI mMndy hn)[

Vaaran English.translation: Sanak et al. got angry when they having gone to Visnu were not allowed entry by the doorkeepers.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: jd snkwidkW dy drvwjy pr igAw auQy qmogun (roh BirAw) ho igAw (ikauˆ jo auh mhwrwj dI AwgÎw bwJ AMdr jwx nhIˆ idMdy sn, aunHW nUM lohy lwKW ho ky rwKS hox dw srwp dy bYTw, Pyr Bgvwn nUM aunHW dy auDwr vwsqy rwm ikRSnwidk Avqwr Dwrny pey, AYsw nwrd pRymI mMnd

Vaaran English.translation: They forced Visnu to undergo ten incarnations and thus the peaceful life of Visnu got tormented.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (ivSnUM dy) ds Avqwr krwky jnm gwl id`qw, (Bwv lVweIAW qy GolW ivc hI aunHW dw smW ibqIq krwieAw)[

lines.gurmukhi: ijin suku jixAw mwie; duKu shwieAw [

Vaaran English.translation: The mother who gave birth to Sukdev was caused to suffer by him by remaining undelivered by the mother for twelve years.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: ijs mW ny suK Pl nUM Kw ky (ArQwq pRym rs Dwrn kr ky shwrnw ipAw[

lines.transliteration_english: guramukh sukh fal khaae; ajar jaraaeiaa ||5||

Vaaran English.translation: Only gurmukhs tasting the fruit of supreme joy have endured the unendurable (name of the Lord).

Vaaran English.translation: The earth becoming lowly concentrated on the feet (of Lord).

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: DrqI ny nIvIˆ ho ky crnW dy ivKy icq lwieAw hY, (Bwv nIc aUc hr eyk jIv jMq dy pYrW hyT rihMdI hY[ qQw:- gurmuK lok BI DrqI vw|U inmrqw Dwrdy hn)[

Vaaran English.translation: Being one with the joy of the lotus feet, it divested itself of the ego.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: Awpxw Awp gvwky sB dy crx kvlW dy rs ivKy iBjI rihMdI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: crx ryxu iqhu loie; ieC ieCwieAw [
lines.transliteration_english: charaN reN tih loe; eichh eichhaaeiaa |

Vaaran English.translation: It is that dust of the feet, which is desired by the three worlds.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: iqMnW lokW dy crxW dI DUVI bxI hoeI hY, (ijs DUVI dI) ie`Cw nUM (swry) locdy hn[

Vaaran English.translation: Fortitude and dutifulness added to it, the contentment is the basis of all.

Vaaran English.translation: It, considering the way of life of every creature, offers livelihood to all.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: jIvn dI jugqI Awpxy ivKy rKky sB nUM irjk pucwauˆdI hY, (Bwv ikswn lok pu`tdy hn, auh aunHW nUM jIvx AMnwidk dy ky pUrn krdI hY, AQvw jIvx khIey jl dw dwn krdI hY)[

Vaaran English.translation: In accordance to the divine will, it behaves like a gurmukh does.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (rjweI) Akwl purK dy Bwxy ivKy pRsMn rihMdI hY, (jyhVy) gurmuK (DrqI vWgUM aukq guxW Xukq hoky Bwxy ivKy pRsMn hn Eh) jnmy hn[

Vaaran English.translation: The water is in the earth and the earth in the water.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: pwxI ivKy DrqI hY DrqI ivKy pwxI hY (Ar sIql suBwA rihMdw hY)[

Vaaran English.translation: Water has no hesitation in going low and lower; it is rather considered more pure.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: nIivAW Qoˆ nIvW jWdw hY, (AVI jW) hT nhIˆ krdw, Pyr inrml hI jwxIdw hY (Bwv G`tw pY jwvy Pyr in`qrky Awpxw gux d`sdw hY)

Vaaran English.translation: To flow down, water bears the concussion of the gravitational force but still likes to go lower.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: v`fI iK`c shwrdw hY, (AwkrKx SkqI invwx nUM lY jWdI hY) (qy sdw) invwxw nUM ruK krdw hY[

lines.transliteration_english: man melee ghul mich; sabh rang maaNeeaai |

Vaaran English.translation: It absorbs in everybody and enjoys with one and all.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: mn mylI Aijhw hY (ik 'Gul imc' khIey) iml iglky swry rMg mwxdw hY (Bwv lwl nwl lwl, ic`ty nwl ic`tw, pIly nwl pIlw ho jWdw hY)[

Vaaran English.translation: Meeting once it does not go apart and hence it is acceptable in the court of the Lord.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (iek vwr 'ivric' khIey) rcky (isMjrky) Pyr A`f nhIˆ huMdw (iesy krky) drgwh ivKy pRmwixk hY (XQw:- “pihlw pwxI jIau hY ijqu hirAw sBu koie”)[

Vaaran English.translation: The devoted persons (bhagats) are identified through their service (to the mankind)

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (jo) propkwr ivKy imilAw hoieAw hY, (eyho) BgqW dI inSwnI hY[

Vaaran English.translation: The tree on the earth has their heads down towards the bottom.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: DrqI auqy ibR`C aultw hoky (isr hyT qy pYr aup`r nUM kr ky au`gdy hn)[

Vaaran English.translation: They endure suffering themselves but pour happiness on the world.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: Awp kSt (Dup Cwauˆ dw) shwrky jg dw vrswau (propkwr) krdy hn[

lines.gurmukhi: Pl dy lwhin BuK; vt vgwieAw [

Vaaran English.translation: Even on being stoned, they offer fruits and quench our hunger.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: v`itAW dy mwirAW bI PlW nUM dyky (lokW dI) Bu`K dUr krdy hn[

Vaaran English.translation: Their shadow is so thick that the mind (and body) enjoys peace.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: sMGxI Cwauˆ dy nwl mn nUM prcwky v`fw suK idMdy hn[

Vaaran English.translation: If someone cuts them, they offer to be sawed.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: jd koeI mnu`K v`Fx Awvy Awpxw Awp (qCwauˆdy) ktwauˆdy hn, (g`l kI Bwxy ivc sMquSt hn)[

Vaaran English.translation: Rare are the persons like tree who accept the will of Lord.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (iqvyˆ Akwl purK dy) Bwxy ivKy snmuK rihky (jo bymuK nhIˆ huMdy, Eh lok) ivrly hI hn[

Vaaran English.translation: From tree are made houses and pillars.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: ibRC Qoˆ Gr (kVIAW Aqy CqIrW nwl) Cqwky aus dy hyT QMimHAw dw shwrw idMdy hn[

Vaaran English.translation: A tree getting sawed helps to make boat.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: isr pr Awrw Drw ky (ibRC k`t ky qKqy cIr ky) byVw GVwauˆdy hn[

Vaaran English.translation: Then adding iron (nails) to it, it gets people float on water.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: lohy nwl Awp nUM jVwky (auh byVw pUrW dy) pUr qwr idMdw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: In spite of the myriads of waves of river, it takes people across.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: drIAwvW (jW smuMdrW) dIAW l`KW lihrW Qoˆ pwr lMGw idMdw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: Likewise, the Sikhs of the Guru, in love and fear of the Lord, practise the Word.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (ijnHW) gurU jI dy is`KW ny BY Aqy (Bwie) pRym nwl Sbd (dy byVy nUM) kmwieAw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: They make people follow the one Lord and get them liberated from the bondages of transmigration.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (auhnW) iek Sbd dy (byVy) pr cVHw ky l`KW pRwxIAW nUM (fubx dy duKW Qoˆ) Cufw idqw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: Sesame gets crushed in the oil press and gives oil.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: iql ny (kolU dI) GwxI ivc (Awpxy Awp nUM) ipVvw qyl kFvwieAw[

Vaaran English.translation: The oil burns in the lamp and the darkness is dispelled.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (Pyr qyl ny Awp nUM) dIvy ivc sVvwky (lokW dw) AMDkwr dUr kIqw[

Vaaran English.translation: The soot of the lamp becomes ink and the same oil reaches the ink-pot with whose help is written the Word of the Guru.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (aus qyl ny) (isAwhI bxky) duAwq ivc pYky (gurU dw Sbd ilKvwieAw[

Vaaran English.translation: By listening to, writing, learning and getting written the words, the imperceptible Lord is eulogised.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (aus Sbd nUM) gurU dy is`KW ny suxky Ar ilK ilKwky prmwqmw (dy nwm) nUM suxwieAw[

Vaaran English.translation: The gurmukhs, losing their sense of ego, practise the Word.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gurmKW ny (iql vW|U qiq`KÎw shwrI) Awpxw Awp gvwky gurU dy Sbd dw ABÎws kIqw, (qyl rUp ho jgq dy pwpW dw AMDyr dUr kIqw)[

lines.transliteration_english: giaan anjan liv laae; sahaj samaaeiaa ||10||

Vaaran English.translation: And using the collyrium of knowledge and concentration immerses in equanimity.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: igAwn (rUpI) surmy ivc ilv lwky (AKMf smwDI lwky) sihj (pd ivKy) smw gey[

lines.gurmukhi: duDu dyie KVu Kwie; n Awpu gxwieAw [

Vaaran English.translation: Standing into a pit they yield milk and do not pose to be counted, i.e. the animals do not have the ego.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (gaU nUM) Gwh Kwky du`D idMdI hY (iPr) Awpxw Awp nhIˆ gxwauˆdI (ZrIb huMdI hY)[

Vaaran English.translation: Milk is converted into curd and the butter comes thereof.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: aus dy du`D Qoˆ dhIˆ jmweIdw hY, (aus nUM irVk ky) iGau k`FIdw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: With their dung and urine, the earth is plastered to offer worship;

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gohy nwl lypx huMdw hY aus dy mUqr Qoˆ (pMcWimqR bxw) (ihMdU lok) pUjw krdy hn[ (Agy iqMn qukW ivKy isDWq d`sdy hn)[

Vaaran English.translation: But while eating variety of goods man turns them into abominable faeces, useless for any purpose.

Vaaran English.translation: Those who have worshipped Lord in the holy congregation, their life is blessed and successful.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (prqUM jo pRwxI) swD sMgq ivKy Groˆ c`lky jw phuMcdw hY Ar auQy siqgur (gurU Arjn dyv jI) nUM iDAwauˆdw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: Only they get the fruit of life on earth.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: aus dw jg ivKy jnm lYxw sPl hY, (aus ny) suK Pl pwieAw hY, (sÍY srUpwnMd nUM Dwrx kIqw hY)[

Vaaran English.translation: Accepting the will of the Lord, cotton suffers a lot.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: kpwh (v`fw) duK shwrdI hY, (mwnoˆ r`b dw) Bwxw cMgw lgdw hY su[

Vaaran English.translation: Having been ginned through the roller, it is carded.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: vylxy ivKy pwky vVyvW A`f kIqw jWdw hY, (h`QW nwl) qUMbw qUMbw (r`qI r`qI) kIqw jWdw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: Having carded it, its yarn is spun.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: ipMx ivcoˆ k`Fdw hY, (qy Pyr criKAW ivc) sUq k`qIdw hY[

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: julwhw nlIAW ivc pwky k`pVw auxdw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: The washerman puts that cloth into his boiling cauldron and then washes it on a stream.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (DobI lok) KuMb pur cVwauˆdy hn (Pyr) vgdy ndI nwilAW pr pwxI nwl swP krdy hn[

Vaaran English.translation: Putting on the same clothes, the rich and the kings adorn the assemblies.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: pwqSwh Ar Swh lok kpiVAW nUM pihnky sBw ivKy suBwiemwn huMdy hn[

Vaaran English.translation: Madder (Rubia munjista) knowing very well gets itself grinded.

lines.gurmukhi: kdy n CfY sMgu; bxq bxwieAw [
lines.transliteration_english: kadhe na chhaddai sang; baNat baNaaeiaa |

Vaaran English.translation: Its character is such that it never deserts the clothes.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (Bwvyˆ rUp bdilAw, prMqU rMg dw) sMg nhIˆ CifAw, eyh bxq bxI hI rhI[

Vaaran English.translation: Likewise, the sugarcane also care freely gets itself crushed.

lines.gurmukhi: krY n mn rs BMgu; AimE cuAwieAw [
lines.transliteration_english: karai na man ras bhang; amio chuaaeiaa |

Vaaran English.translation: Without leaving away its sweetness offers the taste of nectar.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: mn dw rs BMg nhIˆ krdw, AMimRq (vrgw im`Tw rs) cuAwauˆdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: guVu skr KMf AcMgu; Bog BugwieAw [

Vaaran English.translation: It produces jaggery, sugar, treacle molasses many relishable items.

Vaaran English.translation: Similarly, the saints also do not abstain from the service of mankind, and give happiness to all.

Vaaran English.translation: Similarly the gurmukhs by losing their ego come face to face with their own basic nature.
